mapper.select: select p.product_no, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_content, p.product_state, s.seller_company, s.seller_ceo, j.zzim from products p, user_seller s, (select products.product_no, count(product_zzim.product_no) zzim from products left outer join product_zzim on products.product_no = product_zzim.product_no group by products.product_no) j where j.product_no = p.product_no and p.seller_no = s.seller_no and p.product_no=#{productNo}

select order_detail.product_no, review_title, review_content, review_evaluation, review_img from review, order_detail where order_detail.orders_no=review.orders_no and order_detail.product_no=#{productNo}
mapper.insert: insert into product_zzim(zzim_no, user_no, product_no) values(#{zzimNo}, #{userNo}, #{productNo})
mapper.select: select category_no, category_name from product_category where not category_no=1

select img.image_name, p.product_no, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_state, s.seller_company, s.seller_ceo from products p, product_img img, user_seller s where p.product_no = img.product_no and p.seller_no = s.seller_no and thumbnail = '1' and product_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by product_state, p.product_cnt
select count(product_no) count_search from products where product_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
